name: Contact List
description: First app built with React Native. The user is able to sign up or sign in before being able to view a list of contacts. After clicking on a contact name, the user will navigate to another screen where they will get more information about the selected contact

name: Random User Generator
description: On launch and refresh, the app will fetch the data of a single fake profile. The app user is able to amend the first-name and/or last-name

name: Countrypedia
description: In Progress - A REST Countries API with color theme switcher. The user is able to browse all countries on main page, click on a country to get more information, search for a country, filter by continent, and toggle between light and dark themes

name: Volvo Cars
description: In this application, the user is able to browse all cars, and to filter the cars by type. When clicking on the Learn and Shop links, the user is brought to another page to learn about the car or to purchase the car

name: Ubiquity
description: With this app, the user is able to browse all products in a list or grid view, to search for products, to filter by category, and to click on a product to get more information
